meanings.sent1: The old house had a weird feeling, like ghosts were around.
meanings.sent2: It was weird to see a cat chasing a dog instead of the other way around.
meanings.sent3: The weird shadows on the wall made the children giggle.
meanings.sent4: The weird glow from the abandoned lighthouse seemed almost otherworldly.
meanings.sent5: The weird sound in the attic sent shivers down her spine.

meanings.sent1: The weird plant in the garden had purple leaves.
meanings.sent2: It was weird to see snow falling in the middle of summer.
meanings.sent3: The weird hat she wore made everyone smile.
meanings.sent4: The weird dance moves he showed were unlike anything they had seen before.
meanings.sent5: The weird smell coming from the kitchen made her curious.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to fate or destiny
meanings.sent1: It was weird how their paths kept crossing in such a big city.
meanings.sent2: The weird coincidence of them having the same birthday amazed everyone.
meanings.sent3: The weird twist of fate brought them together in the most unexpected way.
meanings.sent4: The weird alignment of the stars seemed to foretell a significant event.
meanings.sent5: The weird feeling of deja vu made her wonder about the mysteries of destiny.
